episodes.title: 21. 19 Kids and Counting: The influence of the IBLP
episodes.description: This is a solo episode where KJ takes you through the story behind the family in 19 Kids and Counting. This families unique lifestyle had reality TV lovers hooked for 10 seasons until scandal was uncovered. Join KJ as she discusses, the family, the cult like institute behind the family and why we were all hooked in the first place. ** Trigger warning ** there are discussions around crimes against children in this one. Its not detailed, but it comes up. Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/the-wise-the-wicked . Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: 19. Love Has Won
episodes.description: This week KJ & Shu look at the Love Has Won cult. This episode explores the rise and fall of the controversial spiritual movement led by Amy Carlson, known as "Mother God." Blending New Age beliefs with conspiracy theories, the cult captivated followers worldwide with promises of ascension and healing. Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/the-wise-the-wicked . episodes.title: 16. What is a cult?
episodes.description: Welcome to Season 3 of The Wise and The Wicked. This season we are exploring cults. How do they work? Why would someone join a cult? How to cult leaders lead their followers to do things they never thought they would do? These are the questions we are looking into on this season. This episode is a little introduction to all things culty. We look at the history of cults, the structure and how someone would find themselves in cult. Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/the-wise-the-wicked . Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
